Verses: 2 avar Ennaip Pullulla Idangalil Meyththu, Amarndha Thanneergal Andaiyil Ennaik Kondupoi Vidugiraar.
3 avar En Aaththumaavaith Thetri, Thammudaiya Naamaththinimiththam Ennai Needhiyin Paadhaigalil Nadaththugiraar.
4 naan Marana Irulin Pallaththaakkile Nadandhaalum Pollaappukkup Bayappaden; Dhevareer Ennodekooda Irukkireer; Umadhu Kolum Umadhu Thadiyum Ennaith Thetrum.
5 en Saththurukkalukku Munbaaga Neer Enakku Oru Pandhiyai Aayaththappaduththi, En Thalaiyai Enneyaal Apishegampannugireer; En Paaththiram Nirambi Vazhigiradhu.
6 en Jeevanulla Naalellaam Nanmaiyum Kirubaiyum Ennaith Thodarum; Naan Karththarudaiya Veettile Neediththa Naatkalaai Nilaiththiruppen.
